titles.title: Recognizing threats to freedom of the press and expression around the world and reaffirming freedom of the press as a priority in efforts of the Government of the United States to promote democracy and good governance.

Recognizing threats to freedom of the press and expression around the world and reaffirming freedom of the press as a priority in efforts of the Government of the United States to promote democracy and good governance.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

term.name: Rule of law and government transparency
Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary: Recognizes the threats to freedom of the press and expression around the world.
